description: Foodbiome is a four-year-old initiative aimed at restoring the food-territory link on both physical and cultural levels. Founded by Jean-Philippe Gu√©rard, it fosters collaboration among diverse stakeholders, including farmers, local authorities, and entrepreneurs, to create a networked ecosystem for food transition. By providing advisory and networking support, Foodbiome seeks to optimize local and national initiatives, ensuring they work together effectively to promote sustainable food systems and economic models.
name: Foodbiome
